**Name of Ritual:** *(e.g., Día de los Muertos altar offering)*

**Location (State, Town):** *(e.g., Oaxaca, San Juan Bautista Cuicatlán)*

**Date of Documentation:** *(Approximate date when the photograph was taken)*

**Description of the Ritual and its Cultural Significance:** *(Provide a concise description of the ritual, its participants, its history, and what it represents within the local culture. 300–500 words is ideal.)*

**Link to Photo File (e.g., in a cloud service):** *(Please provide a publicly accessible link to a high‑quality image file. Preferred formats: JPEG, PNG.)*

**Additional Notes (optional):** *(Any personal observations, context about the photographer’s experience, or requests regarding attribution.)*

---

*Thank you for contributing to the Archivo Ritual Mexicano. Once this issue is submitted, the curators will review your submission and may ask for clarifications. After approval, you will be invited to create a pull request adding the photo and descriptive text to the `archive/` directory.*
